TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Freezable extends System.Windows.DependencyObject
Public MustInherit Class Freezable Inherits DependencyObject
public ref class Freezable abstract : System::Windows::DependencyObject

summary.span: 定义具有可修改状态和只读（冻结）状态的对象。

span.span: Defines an object that has a modifiable state and a read-only (frozen) state.

summary.span: 从 派生的类提供详细更改通知，可以设置为不可变，并且可以克隆自身。

span.span: Classes that derive from provide detailed change notification, can be made immutable, and can clone themselves.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一些特殊功能，这些功能可在使用修改或复制资源昂贵的对象时帮助提高应用程序性能。The class provides special features that can help improve application performance when using objects that are expensive to modify or copy. 对象的示例包括：Examples of objects include the following: - - - - - ## 派生自冻结Deriving From Freezable 派生自 的类获得以下功能：A class that derives from gains the following features: - 特殊状态：只读（冻结）状态和可写状态。Special states: a read-only (frozen) state and a writable state. - 线程安全：可在线程之间共享冻结的 对象。Thread safety: a frozen object can be shared across threads. - 详细更改通知：与其他 对象不同， 对象在子属性值更改时提供更改通知。Detailed change notification: Unlike other objects, a object provides change notifications when sub-property values change. - 轻松克隆：可冻结的类已经实现了几种生成深层克隆的方法。Easy cloning: the Freezable class has already implemented several methods that produce deep clones. 有关使用和创建自己的 对象的信息，请参阅 "[冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)"。For information on using and creating your own objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

threadsafe.span: 此类型的任何公共 成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any public members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 当 属性时，只能从创建 对象的线程访问该对象。

span.span: When the property is , a object can be accessed only from the thread on which it was created.

threadsafe.span: 尝试从另一个线程访问它会引发 。

span.span: Attempting to access it from another thread throws an .

threadsafe.span: 和 方法为封送处理到正确的线程提供支持。

span.span: The and methods provide support for marshaling to the correct thread.

threadsafe.span: 当 属性时， 对象是自由线程的。

span.span: When their property is , objects are free-threaded.

threadsafe.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

span.span: For more information, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

summary.span: 初始化 派生类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是抽象类的受保护的可访问性构造函数。This is the protected-accessibility constructor of an abstract class.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可将对象变为不可修改。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object can be made unmodifiable.

value.span: 如果当前对象可以变为不可修改，或者已经不可修改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current object can be made unmodifiable or is already unmodifiable; otherwise, .

para.span: 此方法实现使用 方法，并将 设置为 ，以确定是否可将 变为不可修改。

span.span: This method implementation uses the method with set to to determine whether a can be made unmodifiable.

para.span: 若要修改此属性在派生类中的行为方式，请重写 方法。

span.span: To modify the way this property behaves in a derived class, override the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Changed As EventHandler

summary.span: 在修改 或其包含的对象时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the or an object it contains is modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在无法修改当前对象时尝试添加或删除事件处理程序（当 `true` 属性时），则会引发异常。If you attempt to add or remove event handlers when the current object is not modifiable (when the property is `true`), an exception is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Freezable Clone() cil managed

summary.span: 创建 的可修改克隆，以制作该对象值的深层副本。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of the , making deep copies of the object's values.

summary.span: 在复制此对象的依赖属性时，此方法会复制表达式（可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying the object's dependency properties, this method copies expressions (which might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆对象的 属性也为

span.span: The cloned object's property is even if the source's property is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 方法将生成冻结的 对象的可修改克隆（这些方法还会克隆未冻结的 对象）。The and methods produce modifiable clones of frozen objects (the methods also clone objects that are not frozen). 克隆实际上是当前对象的深层副本。The clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object. 下表总结了 和 方法之间的差异。The following table summarizes the differences between the and methods. |操作Action|克隆方法行为Clone method behavior|CloneCurrentValue 方法行为CloneCurrentValue method behavior| |------------|---------------------------|---------------------------------------| |复制具有表达式的依赖项属性Copying a dependency property that has an expression|表达式已复制，但可能不再解析。The expression is copied, but might no longer resolve. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).|复制表达式的当前值，而不是表达式本身。The current value of the expression is copied, but not the expression itself.| |复制动画依赖属性Copying an animated dependency property|复制属性的基（未经过动画处理的）值。The property's base (non-animated) value is copied. 不复制动画。Animations are not copied.|复制属性的当前动画值。The property's current animated value is copied. 不复制动画。Animations are not copied.| 请注意，不会复制未设置的属性。Note that unset properties are not copied. 如果未设置的属性具有默认值，该默认值为已冻结 ，则该属性值在其他可修改复本中保持为冻结状态。If an unset property has a default value that is a frozen , that property value remains frozen in the otherwise modifiable clone. ## 在线程之间移动一个冻结Move a Freezable Between Threads 此方法可用于在线程之间移动 。This method can be useful for moving a between threads. 首先，通过调用其 方法使 成为不可修改的。First, make the unmodifiable by calling its method. 现在，另一个线程可以访问 ，并使其可以访问的本地 。Now another thread can access the and make a local that it can access.

para.span: 此方法使用 来生成克隆。

span.span: This method uses to produce the clone.

para.span: 若要修改派生类中此方法的行为，请重写 方法。

span.span: To modify the behavior of this method in a derived class, override the method.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: The object to clone.

summary.span: 使用基（未经过动画处理的）属性值使该实例成为指定 的克隆（深层复制）。

span.span: Makes the instance a clone (deep copy) of the specified using base (non-animated) property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 方法调用，不应在代码中直接调用，除非在重写此方法时调用基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用 ，而不是直接调用此方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly.

para.span: 如果是从 派生的，则可能需要重写此方法。

span.span: If you derive from , you may need to override this method.

para.span: 重写的原因包括：

span.span: Reasons to override include the following:

para.span: -派生类具有未通过依赖属性公开的数据。

span.span: - Your derived class has data that is not exposed via dependency properties.

para.span: -派生类必须执行额外的初始化工作，而不能通过简单地重写 来完成此操作。

span.span: - Your derived class must perform extra initialization work that cannot be accomplished by simply overriding .

para.span: 例如，如果派生类实现 ，则适用。

span.span: For example, this applies if your derived class implements .

para.span: 将其所有数据存储在依赖属性中并且无需执行额外的初始化工作的类不需要重写 。

span.span: Classes that store all their data in dependency properties and that do not need to perform extra initialization work do not need to override .

para.span: 所有实现都必须调用此方法的基实现，这一点非常重要。

span.span: It is essential that all implementations call the base implementation of this method.

para.span: 实现仅应执行默认实现不执行的工作。

span.span: Implementations should only perform work that is not performed by the default implementation.

para.span: 默认实现生成所有可写的本地设置的属性（包括内部表达式）的深层副本。

span.span: The default implementation makes deep copies of all writable, locally set properties, including internal expressions.

para.span: 如果对象具有数据绑定依赖项属性，则会复制表达式，但不能再解析表达式。

span.span: If the object has data-bound dependency properties, the expressions are copied but might no longer resolve.

para.span: 有关克隆数据绑定对象的详细信息，请参阅[冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

span.span: For more information about cloning data-bound objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

para.span: 如果对象具有动画依赖属性，则复制这些属性的基本（未经过动画处理的）值。

span.span: If the object has animated dependency properties, the base (non-animated) value of those properties is copied.

para.span: 不复制动画。

span.span: Animations are not copied.

para.span: 请注意，不会复制未设置的属性，也不会为只读属性。

span.span: Note that unset properties are not copied, nor are read-only properties.

para.span: 如果此类属性具有默认值，该默认值为已冻结的 ，则该属性值在其他可修改复本中保持为冻结状态。

span.span: If such a property has a default value that is a frozen , that property value remains frozen in the otherwise modifiable clone.

para.span: 下面的列表汇总了此方法的预期行为：

span.span: The following list summarizes the expected behavior for this method:

para.span: -生成的副本包含所有 子对象的副本。

span.span: - The copy produced contains copies of all sub-objects.

para.span: -不会复制-Unset 和只读属性。

span.span: - Unset and read-only properties are not copied.

para.span: -复制表达式。

span.span: - Expressions are copied.

para.span: -在创建时这些子对象均不会被冻结。

span.span: - None of these sub-objects are frozen on creation.

para.span: -副本本身未冻结。

span.span: - The copy itself is not frozen.

para.span: -不复制动画。

span.span: - Animations are not copied.

para.span: -仅复制属性基准值，而不复制当前动画值。

span.span: - Only property base values are copied, not current animated values.

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone (deep copy) of the using its current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆对象的 属性也为

span.span: The cloned object's property is even if the source's property is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 方法将生成冻结的 对象的可修改克隆（这些方法还会克隆未冻结的 对象）。The and methods produce modifiable clones of frozen objects (the methods also clone objects that are not frozen). 克隆实际上是当前对象的深层副本。The clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object. 下表总结了 和 方法之间的差异。The following table summarizes the differences between the and methods. |操作Action|克隆方法行为Clone method behavior|CloneCurrentValue 方法行为CloneCurrentValue method behavior| |------------|---------------------------|---------------------------------------| |复制具有表达式的依赖项属性Copying a dependency property that has an expression|表达式已复制，但可能不再解析。The expression is copied, but might no longer resolve. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).|复制表达式的当前值，而不是表达式本身。The current value of the expression is copied, but not the expression itself.| |复制动画依赖属性Copying an animated dependency property|复制属性的基（未经过动画处理的）值。The property's base (non-animated) value is copied. 不复制动画。Animations are not copied.|复制属性的当前动画值。The property's current animated value is copied. 不复制动画。Animations are not copied.| 请注意，不会复制未设置的属性。Note that unset properties are not copied. 如果未设置的属性具有默认值，该默认值为已冻结 ，则该属性值在其他可修改复本中保持为冻结状态。If an unset property has a default value that is a frozen , that property value remains frozen in the otherwise modifiable clone. ## 在线程之间移动一个冻结Move a Freezable Between Threads 此方法可用于在线程之间移动 。This method can be useful for moving a between threads. 首先，通过使用其 方法使 成为不可修改的。First, make the unmodifiable by using its method. 现在，另一个线程可以访问 ，并创建它可以访问的本地克隆。Now another thread can access the and make a local clone that it can access.

para.span: 此方法使用 方法来生成克隆;重写 实施者必须确保在创建时未冻结副本。

span.span: This method uses the method to produce the clone; implementers who override must ensure that the copy is not frozen on creation.

span.span: Makes the instance a modifiable clone (deep copy) of the specified using current property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 方法调用，不应在代码中直接调用，除非在重写此方法时调用基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用 ，而不是直接调用此方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly.

para.span: 如果是从 派生的，则可能需要重写此方法。

span.span: If you derive from , you may need to override this method.

para.span: 重写的原因包括：

span.span: Reasons to override include the following:

para.span: -派生类具有未通过依赖属性公开的数据。

span.span: - Your derived class has data that is not exposed via dependency properties.

para.span: -派生类必须执行额外的初始化工作，而不能通过简单地重写 来完成此操作。

span.span: - Your derived class must perform extra initialization work that cannot be accomplished by simply overriding .

para.span: 例如，如果派生类实现 ，则适用。

span.span: For example, this applies if your derived class implements .

para.span: 将其所有数据存储在依赖属性中并且无需执行额外的初始化工作的类不需要重写 。

span.span: Classes that store all their data in dependency properties and that do not need to perform extra initialization work do not need to override .

para.span: 所有实现都必须调用此方法的基实现，这一点非常重要。

span.span: It is essential that all implementations call the base implementation of this method.

para.span: 实现仅应执行默认实现不执行的工作。

span.span: Implementations should only perform work that is not performed by the default implementation.

para.span: 默认实现会生成所有可写的本地设置属性的深层副本。

span.span: The default implementation makes deep copies of all writable, locally set properties.

para.span: 如果对象包含具有表达式（如数据绑定）的依赖项属性，则会复制该表达式的当前值，而不是表达式本身。

span.span: If the object contains dependency properties with expressions (such as a data binding), the current value of the expression is copied but not the expression itself.

para.span: 如果对象具有动画依赖属性，则会复制这些属性的当前动画值，但不会复制动画。

span.span: If the object has animated dependency properties, the current animated value of those properties is copied, but the animations are not.

para.span: 请注意，不会复制未设置的属性，也不会为只读属性。

span.span: Note that unset properties are not copied, nor are read-only properties.

para.span: 如果此类属性具有默认值，该默认值为已冻结的 ，则该属性值在其他可修改复本中保持为冻结状态。

span.span: If such a property has a default value that is a frozen , that property value remains frozen in the otherwise modifiable clone.

para.span: 下面的列表汇总了此方法的预期行为。

span.span: The following list summarizes the expected behavior for this method.

para.span: -生成的副本包含所有 子对象的副本。

span.span: - The copy produced contains copies of all sub-objects.

para.span: -不会复制-Unset 和只读属性。

span.span: - Unset and read-only properties are not copied.

para.span: -如果对属性进行动画处理，则会复制其当前值，但不会复制动画本身。

span.span: - If a property is animated, its current value is copied, but the animation itself is not.

para.span: -在创建时这些子对象均不会被冻结。

span.span: - None of these sub-objects are frozen on creation.

para.span: -副本本身未冻结。

span.span: - The copy itself is not frozen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个受保护的方法，并且该行为的实际特定于对象的实现依赖于此方法在内部调用的 方法的重写实现。This is a protected method, and the actual object-specific implementations for the behavior are dependent on the override implementation of the method, which this method calls internally.

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, creates a new instance of the derived class.
The new instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请勿直接调用此方法（在实现中调用基时除外）。Do not call this method directly (except when calling base in an implementation). 只要创建 的新实例， 方法就会在内部调用此方法。This method is called internally by the method whenever a new instance of the is created. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 的典型实现。The following example shows a typical implementation of . [!code-csharp[freezablesample_procedural#CreateInstanceCoreExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/freezablesample_procedural/CSharp/freezablesample.cs#createinstancecoreexample)] [!code-vb[freezablesample_procedural#CreateInstanceCoreExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/freezablesample_procedural/visualbasic/freezablesample.vb#createinstancecoreexample)]

para.span: 每个 派生类必须实现此方法。

span.span: Every derived class must implement this method.

para.span: 典型的实现是只调用无参数的构造函数并返回结果。

span.span: A typical implementation is to simply call the parameterless constructor and return the result.

summary.span: 使 对象变为不可修改并将其 属性设置为 ，或测试是否可将 对象变为不可修改。

span.span: Makes a object unmodifiable and sets its property to , or tests whether a object can be made unmodifiable.

summary.span: 使当前对象不可修改，并且将其 属性设置为 。

span.span: Makes the current object unmodifiable and sets its property to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免在调用此方法时出现 的可能性，请检查 属性，以确定是否可以在调用此方法之前将 变为不可修改。To avoid the possibility of an when calling this method, check the property to determine whether the can be made unmodifiable before calling this method.

exception.span: 无法将 设置为不可修改。

span.span: The cannot be made unmodifiable.

para.span: 此方法使用 方法使 不可修改。

span.span: This method uses the method to make the unmodifiable.

para.span: 若要修改冻结行为，请重写 方法。

span.span: To modify freezing behavior, override the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal static bool Freeze (System.Windows.Freezable freezable, bool isChecking);

protected public: static bool Freeze(System::Windows::Freezable ^ freezable, bool isChecking);
static member Freeze : System.Windows.Freezable * bool -> bool

param.name: freezable
param.span: 要检查或要变为不可修改的对象。

span.span: The object to check or make unmodifiable.

param.span: 如果 为 ，则检查此对象，以确定是否可将其变为不可修改。

span.span: If is , the object is checked to determine whether it can be made unmodifiable.

param.span: 如果 为 ，则在可能的情况下将此对象变为不可修改。

span.span: If is , the object is made unmodifiable, if possible.

param.name: isChecking
param.span: 若为 ，则返回是否可冻结对象的指示（不实际冻结对象）；若为 ，则实际冻结对象。

span.span: to return an indication of whether the object can be frozen (without actually freezing it); to actually freeze the object.

summary.span: 如果 参数为 ，则此方法指示是否可将指定的 变为不可修改。

span.span: If the parameter is , this method indicates whether the specified can be made unmodifiable.

summary.span: 如果 参数为 ，则此方法尝试将指定的 变为不可修改，并指示操作是否成功。

span.span: If the parameter is , this method attempts to make the specified unmodifiable and indicates whether the operation succeeded.

returns.span: 当 为 时，如果可以将指定的 变为不可修改，则此方法返回 ；如果无法将其变为不可修改，则返回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if the specified can be made unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable.

returns.span: 当 为 时，如果指定的 目前已经不可修改，则此方法返回 ；如果无法将其变为不可修改，则返回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if the specified is now unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非从 派生并重写 方法，否则不要调用此方法。Do not call this method unless you are deriving from and overriding the method. 此方法可用于 方法，以冻结自身 对象的类数据成员。This method may be used in the method to freeze class data members that are themselves objects. 可以在已冻结（不可修改）的 对象上再次调用此方法。It is alright to call this method again on a object that is already frozen (unmodifiable).

exception.span: 如果 为 ，则表明将 变为不可修改的尝试已失败；对象目前处于未知状态（可能已将其部分冻结）。

span.span: When is , the attempt to make unmodifiable was unsuccessful; the object is now in an unknown state (it might be partially frozen).

para.span: 此方法使用 方法使 不可修改。

span.span: This method uses the method to make the unmodifiable.

para.span: 若要修改冻结行为，请重写 方法。

span.span: To modify freezing behavior, override the method.

Protected Overridable Function FreezeCore (isChecking As Boolean) As Boolean
abstract member FreezeCore : bool -> bool override this.FreezeCore : bool -> bool

param.name: isChecking
param.span: 若为 ，则返回是否可冻结对象的指示（不实际冻结对象）；若为 ，则实际冻结对象。

span.span: to return an indication of whether the object can be frozen (without actually freezing it); to actually freeze the object.

summary.span: 使 对象变为不可修改或测试是否可将其变为不可修改。

span.span: Makes the object unmodifiable or tests whether it can be made unmodifiable.

returns.span: 当 为 时，如果可以将 变为不可修改，则此方法返回 ；如果无法将其变为不可修改，则返回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if the can be made unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable.

returns.span: 当 为 时，如果指定的 目前已经不可修改，则此方法返回 ，如果无法将其变为不可修改，则返回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if the if the specified is now unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请勿直接调用此方法（在实现中调用基时除外）。Do not call this method directly (except when calling base in an implementation). 此方法由 属性（`isChecking` 等于 `true`）和 方法（`isChecking` 等于 `false`）在内部调用。This method is called internally by the property (with `isChecking` equal to `true`) and the method (with `isChecking` equal to `false`).

para.span: 如果类包含未使用依赖项属性存储的数据，则 实现程序必须重写此方法。

span.span: implementers must override this method when the class contains data that is not stored using dependency properties.

para.span: 典型的实现将调用 base，然后对该类包含的所有 类型属性调用静态 方法，仅当所有属性都已冻结（或可能已冻结，以防为 @no_ 指定 时，才返回 ）).

span.span: A typical implementation would call base, then call the static method on all typed properties that the class contains, returning only if all properties were frozen (or could have been frozen, in the case of specifying for ).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Freezable GetAsFrozen() cil managed

summary.span: 使用基（未经过动画处理的）属性值创建 的冻结副本。

span.span: Creates a frozen copy of the , using base (non-animated) property values.

summary.span: 由于副本已冻结，因此将通过引用复制任何冻结的子对象。

span.span: Because the copy is frozen, any frozen sub-objects are copied by reference.
A frozen copy of the .

returns.span: 副本的 属性设置为 。

span.span: The copy's property is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用此方法之前，应检查 属性，以验证是否可以冻结 。You should check the property before calling this method to verify that the can be frozen. 使用此方法类似于使用 创建副本，然后使用 方法将其冻结。Using this method is similar to creating a copy using the and then freezing it with the method. 和 方法可以提高复制性能，因为它们不会克隆已冻结 子对象;它们只按引用复制它们。The and methods can improve copying performance because they do not clone sub-objects that are already frozen; they only copy them by reference. 下表总结了 和 方法之间的差异。The following table summarizes the differences between the and methods. |操作Action|GetAsFrozen 方法行为GetAsFrozen method behavior|GetCurrentValueAsFrozen 方法行为GetCurrentValueAsFrozen method behavior| |------------|---------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| |复制具有表达式的依赖项属性Copying a dependency property that has an expression|方法会引发 ，因为它不能 属性。The method throws an because it cannot the property.|复制表达式的当前值，而不是表达式本身。The current value of the expression is copied, but not the expression itself.| |复制动画依赖属性Copying an animated dependency property|复制属性的基（未经过动画处理的）值。The property's base (non-animated) value is copied. 不复制动画。Animations are not copied.|复制属性的当前动画值。The property's current animated value is copied. 不复制动画。Animations are not copied.| 请注意，不会复制未设置的属性，也不会为只读属性。Note that unset properties are not copied, nor are read-only properties. 若要创建未冻结的 副本，请使用 方法。To create a copy of the that is not frozen, use the method.

exception.span: 无法冻结此 ，因为它包含表达式或经过动画处理的属性。

span.span: The cannot be frozen because it contains expressions or animated properties.

para.span: 此方法使用虚拟 方法来生成克隆。

span.span: This method uses the virtual method to produce the clone.

span.span: The instance to copy.

summary.span: 让该实例成为指定的 的冻结克隆，前者使用基（非动画的）属性值。

span.span: Makes the instance a frozen clone of the specified using base (non-animated) property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 方法调用，不应在代码中直接调用，除非在重写此方法时调用基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的冻结副本，请调用 ，而不是直接调用此方法。To create a frozen copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly.

para.span: 如果是从 派生的，则可能需要重写此方法。

span.span: If you derive from you may need to override this method.

para.span: 重写的原因包括：

span.span: Reasons to override include the following:

para.span: -派生类具有未通过依赖属性公开的数据。

span.span: - Your derived class has data that is not exposed via dependency properties.

para.span: -派生类必须执行额外的初始化工作，而不能通过简单地重写 来完成此操作。

span.span: - Your derived class must perform extra initialization work that cannot be accomplished by simply overriding .

para.span: 例如，如果派生类实现 ，则适用。

span.span: For example, this applies if your derived class implements .

para.span: 将其所有数据存储在依赖属性中并且无需执行额外的初始化工作的类不需要重写 。

span.span: Classes that store all their data in dependency properties and that do not need to perform extra initialization work do not need to override .

para.span: 所有实现都必须调用此方法的基实现，这一点非常重要。

span.span: It is essential that all implementations call the base implementation of this method.

para.span: 实现仅应执行默认实现不执行的工作。

span.span: Implementations should only perform work that is not performed by the default implementation.

para.span: 默认实现为其包含的所有其他可写的本地设置属性生成任何未冻结的可冻结对象和浅层副本的深层副本。

span.span: The default implementation makes deep copies of any unfrozen freezables and shallow copies of all other writable, locally set properties it contains.

para.span: 如果对象具有数据绑定依赖项属性，则会复制表达式，但不能再解析它们;有关克隆数据绑定对象的详细信息，请参阅[冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

span.span: If the object has data-bound dependency properties, the expressions are copied but might no longer resolve; for more information about cloning data-bound objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

para.span: 如果对象具有动画依赖属性，则会复制这些属性的基本（未经过动画处理的）值。

span.span: If the object has animated dependency properties, the base (non-animated) values of those properties are copied.

para.span: 不复制动画。

span.span: Animations are not copied.

para.span: 请注意，不会复制未设置的属性，也不会为只读属性。

span.span: Note that unset properties are not copied, nor are read-only properties.

para.span: 如果重写此方法，则必须调用基实现。

span.span: If you do override this method, you must call the base implementation.

para.span: 不需要在复制值时 值。

span.span: You do not need to values as they are copied.

para.span: 返回后，结果将被 冻结。

span.span: The result is frozen by before being returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 方法调用，不应在代码中直接调用，除非在重写此方法时调用基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的冻结副本，请调用 ，而不是直接调用此方法。To create a frozen copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly.

para.span: 如果是从 派生的，则可能需要重写此方法。

span.span: If you derive from , you may need to override this method.

para.span: 重写的原因包括：

span.span: Reasons to override include the following:

para.span: -派生类具有未通过依赖属性公开的数据。

span.span: - Your derived class has data that is not exposed via dependency properties.

para.span: -派生类必须执行额外的初始化工作，而不能通过简单地重写 来完成此操作。

span.span: - Your derived class must perform extra initialization work that cannot be accomplished by simply overriding .

para.span: 例如，如果派生类实现 ，则适用。

span.span: For example, this applies if your derived class implements .

para.span: 将其所有数据存储在依赖属性中并且无需执行额外的初始化工作的类不需要重写 。

span.span: Classes that store all their data in dependency properties and that do not need to perform extra initialization work do not need to override .

para.span: 所有实现都必须调用此方法的基实现，这一点非常重要。

span.span: It is essential that all implementations call the base implementation of this method.

para.span: 实现仅应执行默认实现不执行的工作。

span.span: Implementations should only perform work that is not performed by the default implementation.

para.span: 默认实现使用 方法创建新的 ，并为其包含的所有其他可写的本地设置属性创建可冻结对象的深层副本。

span.span: The default implementation creates a new using the method and makes deep copies of unfrozen freezables and shallow copies of all other writable, locally set properties it contains.

para.span: 如果对象具有数据绑定依赖项属性，则会复制数据绑定，但这些绑定可能不再解析;有关克隆数据绑定对象的详细信息，请参阅[冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

span.span: If the object has data-bound dependency properties, the data bindings are copied but might no longer resolve; for more information about cloning data-bound objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

para.span: 如果对象具有动画依赖属性，则会复制这些属性的当前动画值，但不会复制动画。

span.span: If the object has animated dependency properties, the current animated value of those properties is copied, but the animations are not.

para.span: 此默认实现不会复制 中的只读依赖项属性。

span.span: Read-only dependency properties within a are not copied by this default implementation.

para.span: 如果重写此方法，则必须调用基实现。

span.span: If you do override this method, you must call the base implementation.

para.span: 不需要在复制值时 值。

span.span: You do not need to values as they are copied.

para.span: 返回后，结果将被 冻结。

span.span: The result is frozen by before being returned.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsFrozen As Boolean
public: property bool IsFrozen { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示对象当前是否可修改。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object is currently modifiable.

value.span: 如果该对象已被冻结且无法修改，则为 ；如果可以修改该对象，则为 。

span.span: if the object is frozen and cannot be modified; if the object can be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 `true` 属性时尝试修改对象，则会引发 。Attempting to modify an object when its property is `true` throws an . 从对象模型的角度来看，此属性是只读的。This property is read-only from the object model perspective. 某些有关 行为的文档可能会提到，在讨论其他 方法的行为时，"设置 `true`" 或类似的语言，但在类实例内部发生此行为，当实例操作抽象类中存在的私有变量。Some of the documentation about behaviors may mention "sets to `true`" or similar language when discussing the behavior of other methods of , but this behavior is happening internally in the class instances, when methods of the instance manipulate the private variables that exist within the abstract class. 若要设置此属性的值，应调用 。To set the value of this property, you should call . 这实际上只是一次操作，用于将 属性从初始默认 `false` 状态更改为 `true` 状态。This effectively is a one-time operation to change the property from the initial default `false` state to the `true` state. 没有将值设置回 `false`的可用方法。There is no available means to set the value back to `false`. 相反，您可以更改从原始源进行的任何深层复制（请参阅 方法）。Instead, you could change any deep copy made from the original (see the method). 这是设计使然，并且是在应用到 模式有用的情况时，派生类的行为方式。This is by design and is how any derived class should behave when applied to the cases where the pattern is useful.

summary.span: 验证 是否未被冻结，并且是否正在从有效的线程上下文中访问它。

span.span: Verifies that the is not frozen and that it is being accessed from a valid threading context.

summary.span: 的继承项应当在任何 API 一开始写入不属于依赖项属性的数据成员时调用此方法。

span.span: inheritors should call this method at the beginning of any API that writes to data members that are not dependency properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用 来验证线程上下文是否可访问，如果 实例已冻结，则会引发异常。This method calls to verify the threading context is accessible, and it throws an exception if the instance is already frozen.

exception.span: 实例已冻结，并且无法写入其成员。

span.span: The instance is frozen and cannot have its members written to.

para.span: 派生自 的类应调用 ，然后才能尝试写入不是依赖项属性的任何成员。

span.span: Classes that derive from should call before attempting to write to any members that are not dependency properties.

para.span: 如果在 API 中调用 ，则可以省略对 的调用。

span.span: If you call in an API, you can omit a call to .
